body:
Lip was talking about her chest size. And being flat doesn't make you a loli. 

She doesn't act like a loli and no one treated her as one.
Loli is about body type, Melt is 156cm without her stilts, same as BB/Lip/Sakura, which many would say is too tall to be considered a loli, she is just a flat-chested woman.

@WeebSlayer7  She is. Lip's dialogue in "My Room": "Melt might act the older sister, but she's actually more childish than me, and has the body of one... n-no, it's nothing! Please don't tell Melt about this! ".
Why is this tagged as lolicon? Melt isn't a loli.
